content.detailedDescription:
On september 21, 2013 @ approximately 1815 hours mountain time, in the village of oak creek, sedona az, on a clear warm evening in a no cloud sky, a large, white glowing barbell type object hovered in the south western section of the sky (approximately 10 or 15 degrees west of the large, flat southern  mesa behind the big park grade school). though the object was only at a +/- 1000 foot altitude it hovered in the same spot for a period of about 20 to 30 minutes and made no noticeable noise. 
i was able to take three photos of the object and as soon as i can figure out how to download the jpegs from my droid to my pc i will forward the pictures to anyone who might express an interest in seeing them.
unfortunately, at the time i was unable to continue watching the object or see it arrive or depart so my estimation of 20 to 30 minutes was the amount of time i was able to view and photograph it. though i am now retired from the military i have flown and parachuted from a great number of aircraft as well as having worked in the gemini program as part of a crew in retrieving the bell shaped capsules in in the south china sea; therefore, from this and other past sightings and photos and videos i have taken i believe i know what flies and is not ours as well as what we are still not capable of. going out on a limb i don't believe this is one of ours unless it was designed and came from a future earth date and site!
content.summary: I viewed a barbell or two round bright white lit balls in the voc of sedona az

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road and it was foggy i was 50 feet from the red light when i noticed another driver stopped in the road 45 feet before the light. i looked straight ahead and saw what i would describe as a white circle shape, like the moon and i thought to myself "oh the sun is coming up". but the sun was two feet above the ground, right in front of my car. i picked up my phone to take a picture and the light shot to the left, and my smart phone started going through the different apps. i pulled over into a parking lot and the light stopped, so i took a picture. as i was watching the light i had a sense that it was watching me. i was able to take a quick right turn and what ever it was turned and flew directly over my car. there are tree's and buildings on the road so the object had to be low to the ground to fly directly over my car. at that point it looked to be orange in color and i started to see spots like being blinded by a light. i drove to two more different locations,and still saw the object. the sun started to shine and it just flew off. i never would have thought anything about the experience had it not been two feet from the ground, flew over my car, and changed directions as i did. and changed from what appeared to be four feet to get larger as it flew higher in the sky. when it was in front of my car it looked like a solid white mass.The person in the other vehicle turned left on a red light to get out of the area.
content.summary: White, round and changed size

content.detailedDescription:
I started looking around the skies at 4:45 a.M. with my bushnell 10x50
as i was looking up at exactly 5:00 a.M. a bright, small light blue object came into view directly overhead.
 watched it move at the normal speed of a satellite going from the  south to the north where i lost it over the top of my house.
still looking around at 5:06 a.M. another object came into view. it was slightly overhead and moving from the north to the south.
it was a brighter object than the one before moving much faster. it was a brighter color of bluish-white.
the object flew overhead heading south where i lost it over my neighbors roof.
at 5:26 a.M. i changed positions in my yard now looking mostly to the south where a larger yellowish object was moving from the south-east
to the northwest but moving very very slowly. imagine if you will just holding your binoculars steady and having the object come into
view and let in go all the way through your site. it took 15 seconds for the object just to move that far which by any standards is quite slow.
i picked this object up at around 45 degrees above the south-eastern horizon and watched as it went behind my tree where it never popped out the other side.
i got up and looked around but could not distinguish it from all the stars. 
at 5:31 a.M. as i was searching for that last object, an extremely bright yellowish and much larger object came into view from behind the same tree
moving quite fast from the south-west towards the north-east. it moved out of site with in 30 seconds where i lost it over the horizon.
these last 2 objects could be the same only if the first one stopped for a few minutes which is possible but i can not prove this. 
although where i first noticed this object would have been very close to where i lost the other object behind my tree except it was 
now moving to the north-east rather than the object before which was moving towards the north-west.
there were no airplanes or any other flying objects in the skies at this time.
content.summary: 4 satelite type units moving in many differant directions

content.detailedDescription: I took my pets outside for their restroom break. when i got outside and was standing on my porch i noticed an unusual bright blue light passing to my left (northeast) out of my peripheral vision. when i turned to look directly at the light i noticed the shape was more cigar shaped having rounded ends and a white surface color and a bright blue light circular in shape on what would be the front of the shape from my perspective. as the shape passed behind the tree tops i expected to see it come out on the other side of the trees what i saw was not the object but what i can only describe as a small point of light moving at high speed. similar to a meteor with no tail, my initial thought was that this was something explainable and when it cleared the trees i would be able to make an identification. when the object seemed to shoot off it did make me feel a little uncomfortable and wondering if what i saw was something i could not explain. i honestly expected to see jets in pursuit and i waited for several minutes in the hopes that something would happen to make me understand what i had seen was natural. nothing happened to make me think this was abnormal phenomena.
content.summary: Observed bright light and cigar shape through tree tops

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on rt. 378 it was 5:35 a.M. i saw the craft on the left hand side of the road hovering over the trees if i had to guess probably 400 meters away maybe more it was dark so its hard to judge. the craft was enormous compared to any i've ever seen. been on commercial jets and did some time in the military and saw a lot of ac-130s and chinooks it was much bigger than either one. if you ever go to the super walmart it was about the size of the store front looking at it where it was head on. it hovered for a good 15 minutes i could see it because the lights on it were huge as well. it was dark colored couldnt make out any markings or anything but just a general shape which was only what i could describe as a incredibly huge plane. the lights were circular yellow orange color and had something wierd to them almost like when you shine a spotlight in the rain but different maybe more like when you see dust particles in the beam of a lazer but as close as it was it was defenentily to far for me to see rain in lights (and it wasnt raining at the time either). it kept hovering after i passed it and i was so amazed but so curious i found the first road i could and turned around and sped back to where it was which wasnt far down the street i was trying to find a way to get closer to it but as soon as i got to where the trees didnt obstruct my view it shut its lights off and took off at a extremely fast pace.
content.summary: Huge hovering craft size of a medium-large building huge wings huge yellow orange lights hovered then turned lights off and left  fast when i tried to get closer to it.

content.detailedDescription: At the park shoot
content.summary: Windy & sunny &cloud spicials & i shoot a pic of lanscape and at the home find it at the pc

content.detailedDescription:
During the morning of september 24, 1013, approximately 3.50 am, i observed a cluster of lights low in the night sky, through my side door���s window, which faces south. intermittent sleep that night and while i was walking down my hallway i first noticed at a glance the moon being very bright, and glancing thru the window i immediately spotted a cluster of blinking lights where i had never noticed any previous to this night.
as close a meteorological report as i can make it, the night was very clear with a very bright three-quarter moon, and it not in any direct line of or view of these lights, and only very, very high altitude wisps of a cloud here and there. very many stars very clearly seen throughout the sky as well. winds aloft in our southern sky were forecast at 6 to 9 mph at 6000 ft., not unusual for that time of night, and time of year. 
the lights were in the southern sky, at 152 degrees relative, declination of about 25 degrees from the horizon, a very tight cluster of blinking lights. not fixed per location per se, but slightly bobbing up and down and some side-to-side motion, always in unison, but always remaining within about a five degree arc, or circle, that same spot of the sky. difficult to define the distance to the lights but based upon the ease i could see the lights changing and alternating, i���ll estimate them approximately two to five miles distant. 
multicolored, reds, blues, greens, with a very bright white always staying in its center of the cluster, all alternating colors from one side of the cluster to another, and from to bottom and back again, with no  discernible pattern as i could observe. at no time did the cluster of lights separate, but stayed in its configuration throughout the observation, which lasted at least forty-five minutes, uninterrupted during that period, with the lights remaining in the same relative position. about forty-five minutes into the event, i observed the cluster had changed position to about forty degrees declination and to approximately 195 degrees relative. i did not observe this movement as i had moved away for about five minutes from the window, it was when i returned to it i instantly noted they had moved. the cluster then remained in its new position for some time, approximately thirty minutes, when at that time they simply vanished. one moment they were there, the next they weren���t.
content.summary: Cluster of  hovering yet moving blinking multi-colored lights observed in southern sky

content.detailedDescription:
Is be from has be  report bat
over sightings report now bat sightigs was attank te  with abdcution on
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sightings has be from de t er enter ring over sightings in  laborrei

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dog outside one last time before bed and couldn't help but look up at the sky since it is such a clear night providing a clear view of the stars.
i noticed an object slowly gliding silently from the east to the north west. it caught my eye because of the shape which seamed to be sort of a square shape which i could make out due to the light pattern on the bottom.
i watched this object for about five minutes before it vanished beyond the tree line to the north west of here. the flashing lights on the bottom weren't very bright and all seemed to flash at random unlike most air craft i see fly over this area.
content.summary: Silent square shaped object slowly gliding off to the nw

content.detailedDescription: Coming from my parents house back to my house in waterloo. headed west. saw two lights down the road in front of us on 68 township rd. saw 3 bright lights in the sky. i said to my girlfriend, "they look like ufos, but must be airplanes coming directly at us." then i said, "it makes no sense for all three to be headed directly at us." two got closer. we stopped and stared. then i realized one disappeared, instantly. we drove a few hundred metres until the one was directly overtop/left of us. maybe a hundred feet in the air. it was hardly moving. i got out to take a picture. i told her to get out; she was balling her eyes out begging me to get in the car. i prayed out loud. i stayed outside until she yelled to look over to the right. another one was in the tree line maybe 30ft off the ground and 300 metres away. we watched it hover. i got in and drove to cut it off down another road. we lost all three and decided to turn around. on the way back we saw where the one in the trees landed. there was bright lights pulsating in the forest. we then left. i felt quite calm the whole time. my girlfriend was crying, she was overwhelmed. she still doesn't know what to believe, but we both know what we saw. (no drugs or alcohol involved.)
content.summary: Surreal, life-changing, dream-like

content.detailedDescription: Looking at stars on front porch noticed flashing lights long distance off grabbed my binoculars to look noticed green and red flashing lights in one spot object never moved watched for over thirty mins don't know what it is would like to know
content.summary: Flashing lights stationary in distance for over 30 mins still there now

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed lighted object in nw sky from olathe, ks. it seemed to be a plane until took notice of no typical flashing lights and it's slow hovering motion and side to side movements at times. object in distance and hovering with small movements left to right. object is still in nw sky and has only moved slightly north since 8:30 pm. many planes have flown by proving how slow moving and how elevated this object really is.
10:45 pm currently. proven to be unable to show up on photo or video
content.summary: Lighted object spotted in nw sky hovering small movements lt to rt still present 2.5 hours later

content.detailedDescription: My mother had called me to tell me to look outside to the nw. i went outside and saw a bright light in the sky. i knew it was not a star due to the shape, the black in the center and the blinking red and blue lights at the tips. first looked like a sphere but was a triangle. lights at 2 bottom tips. it was swaying back and forth from left to right slowly. wasn't going anywhere so it wasn't a plane. my sister in kansas also witnessed this from her home. neighbors, and friends also saw this object. as the sky got darker, it got dimmer. so that rules out a star and a plane. fighter jets were flying towards it and around it. was reported to media channels ktiv channel 4 and kcau channel 9 in sioux city but nothing was reported. had no sound what so ever. i believe it is a ufo (coincides with other sightings everyday this month from all over the world. from australia to ireland, from canada to peru. we are not alone.
content.summary: Sphere/triangle shape stationary blinking red/blue lights, black center lightly swinging back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking dog walking up the street facing south direction when noticed an unusual bright object in the sky at 60 degree angle. suddenly noticed 4-5 more orange glowing spheres of similar size and speed on what appeared to be same direction of travel.  observed objects for 5 minutes. saw other people on the street and was surprised they seemed unaware of objects in the sky.
objects were not moving at high rate of speed too slow for usual aircraft.
airplane came into this airspace at same time seemed to be following then turned and flew in opposite direction. appeared and sounded like single engine aircraft.
i felt surprised as this was highly unusual considering fairly populated area.
objects turned southeast then seemed to "blink " out one by one until i could no longer observe them.
i usually would have cell phone with me and could have taken a video however i accidentally left it on counter at home.
content.summary: Out walking dog at 8:20 pm.  saw large glowing objet approx 5 miles away in sky.  then observed 4-5 more similar glowing objects following on same flight east  to west.  objects observed for 5 minutes then turned southeast and bliked out one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: Was on dinner break at woodbury commons in central valley ny at 530 pm.  100% cloud free sky.  i looked up and ahead and noticed what looked to be a short  chem trail/ plane cloud trail.  it appeared to be descending but i couldnt see any object that was creating this trail.  it was also very short in length compared to the trails you see that cross the sky regularly.  i looked to my left over the mountains that sit next to the shopping complex and noticed a silver oval shaped object that i would guess was about 3000 feet in elevation hovering.  it was too far away to make out any characteristics on its surface.  this object i would guess was about 5 away from the other object creating the descending clous or smoke trail.  i turned my head away for maybe 5 seconds at most to look at a person walking by me and then looked back up and ahead towards where the descending trail was and it had completely dissappeared.  usually plane trails linger and spread as they fade away.  this one was completely gone!  just bright blue sky.  i looked for the silver object to my left and it haf now moved miles past where the trail had been.  almost out of my view which i would guess could be about 15 miles or so.  i cant imagine an object traveling at that speed.  i couldnt explain anything i had just seen and about 5 later a low flowing green helicopter flew over the mountain tops and continued until out of my view due to the mountains.  i went back into work and have been thinking about it ever since.  i have never seen any cloud/chem trail dissappear in a matter of seconds or an object get from one point in the sky to another in seconds.  i wish i had time to get my phone out to shoot video of this but i dont think i would have had time since the whole event lasted under 10 seconds.
content.summary: 2 objects, 1 hovered then straight line shot away.  the other left a descending trail that dissappeared in seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
Sept 25 2013 at 7:40pm i noticed the same bright light hovering over scarborough near eglinton ave and markham rd as i reported to mufon case # 51067 on sept 24 2013.
the object repeated the same pattern as i reported sept 24th 2013 ,
tonight was a little different i decided watch the skies at 7:30pm to see what direction the object came from.
one minute nothing was there then a cloud past and there if was.
the object sat there for less then an hour and started to move west.
i took a couple of pics and a video of the light in the sky before it got dark.
i also noticed what looked like a flare  coming from the sky not from the object. 
the flare like object look like a out of control fire work also white in color. 
3 days in a row i've seen this object .
lets see if it comes back again tomorrow. 
if you live in scarborough near eglinton ave and markham rd look south west for the brightest  light in the sky and wait until 8:25pm and you should see it move west towards the dvp.
content.summary: 3rd night event

content.detailedDescription:
Last sunday 9/22/2013, i saw, for the second time in my life, a ufo. this one was from my 2nd floor (well lit) balcony at my apt here in austin. it was roughly 9:45 p.M. here goes...

i was facing due south. the object was moving in a s/se direction. from my view it was moving about 20-25 degrees above the horizon in a downward path to the s/se. there was no sound. i saw it for about 7 seconds. it looked far enough away that it might be over downtown. (12 miles) it stood out from the background because there were 10 lights moving in the same direction on a clear night.

these lights were arranged around the perimeter of a reuleaux triangle. the area in the picture shaded orange is the shape i'm describing. for reference, i will use the apex as the bottom left corner of the image i posted. this is the direction in which all 10 lights were traveling. the lights were arranged as follows:

1 at the apex, 1 dead center, 2 close together left leading curved edge, 2 close together right leading edge, and 4 equidistant along the rear facing edge. there were "wisps" coming from both leading edges as though is was disturbing the atmosphere enough to make contrails that followed the same curvature as the leading edges.

no, i did not have my phone on me to get a picture or video. not enough time before it was out of my field of view.
content.summary: Reuleaux triangle with 9 perimeter lights and one in the center. 10 total.  left wispy contrails from both leading edges.

content.detailedDescription:
This is the second time i saw this same object at the same area except this time i had a newer phone and was able to capture three images... was on my porch talking on the phone looked up and saw this this again.. hung up phone and took photos.. this object made no sound whatsoever and i live les than twelve  miles from pittsburgh international airport so i know airplanes and helicopters even blimps.. this was not any of those.. i've seen another type of unknown thing but i wouldn't be able to describe it by writing.. it was so strange i'd have to explain but this is the one that i have proof of.  i am always looking in the sky.. i'm fascinated by the unknown but i'm not over zealous and certainly not a whacko :-).

 you have to zoom in really close to see the light but that's because i don't know how to use the zoom on my phone camera.. the photo with the building in it.. the light is above and to the left but once you zoom in you can't miss it.. on all three photos.. plz let me know what you think.. hope i've contributed something useful.

 thank you for your time

 [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: bright orange object flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my job at around 0555hrs having a cigarette and just staring at the stars, when i spotted two objects flying in unison. at first i thought it was birds but the object had no visible wings. also, i then thought it might have been an airplane but i the object had no lights.
content.summary: Ufo sighted over grand prairie

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw it, well one object last year around the whole nibiru thing. now i see three or four objects beside the sun when i take a pic in the negative and other ways. i also have a link to a nasa website involving comet ison. 

the objects are stationary but they move slighty depending on the time, and area.

i havent lost sight it has been there for three days so far, i have lots of pics and i need to have these photos analyzed or something.

i am only sending one photo but i have plenty more. please zoom in to the top left beside the sun.
content.summary: Three or four solid objects beside sun. different days, times,and ares and three different phones

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog for a walk on an unlit pathway. i generally always look in the sky for satellites or falling stars.
as i was glancing directly above i saw a light dot start streaking across the sky from nw to se. it was different than any other light i ever saw moving across the sky. it was ot unusual for me to see satellites or falling stars. next thing i know another light dot in the same area follow across in the same path. both dots disappeared in same direction. they were nothing i have ever witnessed
about 10 seconds later as i was looking to the se i saw the same type of dots come out of different directions and meet up in the se sky. when they came together and paused for a couple of seconds then all disappeared in the se sky. 
these objects were well organized and the speed at which they came together was something that i have never seen before. they appeared to be well organized. 

i am now a true believer that something we do not understand or may never understand is out there. the organization of the dots indicates to me that they are not a natural occurrence and unless proven wrong there is more out there than what we could possibly understand. it is something that will stay with me for the rest of my life.
content.summary: Different than anything i have ever seen in the past.

content.detailedDescription: I am writing to report a sighting of four ball shape objects this morning (9/16) at 8:01 am. i was finishing my walk with our dog, walking through our courtyard, when i saw four round spheres in a line. they were several hundred feet in the air, i would estimate 500 feet. they were in two sets of two and basically stationary while slowly rotating.  one was reddish in color, the other three, gray.  i tried taking a photo with my cellphone but could not focus, it wanted to focus on the contrails, much higher and behind. i ran the few steps inside my house to get my camera and tripod, but on my return 15 seconds later they were gone, disappearing from nearly directly overhead. i believe this would exclude the possibility of balloons. skies were clear with a few contrails at much higher altitude, i noticed little or no wind. no witnesses besides myself were around. i swear to the truthfulness of this sighting. in the attached photo, i have used photoshop to approximate the size, shape and location of the objects. the base photo was taken 5 minutes after the sighting. (on the attached form i stated "10 times that of a star" in apparent size, and also, "1/4 the size of a full moon," rather than "aspirin" as i chose here. i also indicated the actual size was larger than a basketball.)
content.summary: Four spheres about 500 feet or more above our courtyard: ran for camera, gone 15 seconds later.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on our evening walk. a star like orb caught my left eyes  attention.  it was planet like in brightness.  it seemed to be on a bending flight path(almost like a narrow s) but it still moved across the sky quite fast. i had seen another white orb like this six years prior waiting to go into the movies, however the characteristics of that sighting were pretty different. that one appeared out of nowhere,hovered for a second, increased in brightness then jetted off a couple centimeters across the sky to disappear leaving behind a motion blur bar that disappeared very oddly.  this one was flying when i saw it. i described it to my neighbor as like it was standing still and space was moving around it. but anyways it flew into a cloud the same time the treeline cut my vision of it off. i also saw seemingly the same orb a couple nights after that again on my walk. this time it just shot straight across the sky, again getting cut off by trees.  however all three sightings might of been 7, 8 seconds all together but nonetheless i saw what i saw and i do not believe humans were in control of any of them.
content.summary: Walking my dog, starlike orb caught my eye.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car driving to work on the friday morning of january 25, 2013.
it was 5:56 am as i took the final turn leading to my work-site. it was dark at this hour of the morning. as i drove up the heavily treed road, i suddenly noticed what looked like a greenish firework ember falling slowly down into the tree line above me. all of a sudden, a huge, yet silent flash went off which trained my eyes away from the "ember', glancing all around me.It was very much like a lightening flash, except greenish.
i remember gripping my steering wheel tightly while expecting to hear a boom as it made me think "bomb". no sooner did i think "bomb" there were multiple flashes of green illuminations darting all around me and my vehicle.I've equated this in current times to feeling as though i were in a microwave oven.These flashes were so bright that i could see right through the trees and hillside terrain. i thought "what the heck, is someone welding?" no sooner did this thought cross my mind, i glanced up to see a light very high above me just dropping downward at an incredible rate of speed. here, i thought "meteor" but i just closed my eyes tightly even though it was heading right for me and my vehicle. but then nothing. when i'd opened my eyes, the interior of my car was filled with a yellowish glow. as i looked up this time, i'll never forget what i saw for as long as i live. a ufo was the only category that my mind could fit this thing into. it hovered in mid air directly above the power lines, and directly above me. i took in the object for approximately 3-4 seconds. it was metallic in appearance with a grooved bottom, rectangular in shape and had lights coming off it's corners. as it was right over me, i only had this view of it. it had to be three to four times the size of my car at least. the entire event was absolutely silent. after three to four seconds, i floored it right under this thing as fast as i could. once i made it up the road, i glanced back, but to my surprise, it was gone. i went into my job but i believe that i was in a state of shock. i told no one and seemed to be on auto pilot through my day. however, by the time i came home that evening, i became highly troubled and disturbed by the event. i felt sick all weekend, called out sick that monday. i was literally afraid to return to my job and drive the scenic route. it was quite the experience. upon calling out sick that monday,
i did report my experience to the ufo reporting center, but my report was incomplete. i felt desperate to find some answers myself but just could not tell my whole truth due to the fact that it was so outrageous. in hindsight, it's good as i had to grapple with it myself first. this is why i'm reporting it now-in full.
you question your sanity with such an event, question if you hallucinated everything, and you're afraid to tell anyone because they might think you're completely nuts. i knew that i had to pull myself together, and as hard as it was, i went and got myself evaluated as a result of the event.  this was a really difficult risk for me to take, but once i was able to prove to them and myself that i was of sound mind, it gave me the courage to move forward in my life. the good news..I'm not crazy, and i do have to live with the fact that i will not ever know if i hallucinated it, or not. i simply have to accept it and move on, which i've done.
content.summary: Firework ember, green, huge sonic flash, no boom, sudden multiple flashes,  fast falling craft above me, stopped-hovered.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright star-like object in the sky while looking west. while the object looks like a star it appears too bright to be one. it also looks like it is too low in the sky to be a star. i have seen the object many many times but i just dismissed it at first. i then became interested in the alien/ufo phenomenon, so i began to study it more and more. most of time i never saw it move with the naked eye but there was an exception. one night i was talking to my father about 8:40 at night. i was outside and leaning up against my pickup truck. my father tends to be long winded when he speaks so i knew that if i went outside that i would have plenty of time to observe the object. it shows up almost every night, but on this particular night i saw it slowly move from right to left. i also decided to film it on another night around the same time using a sony video camera with night shot and night shot plus technology. when i used the night shot plus technology the object appears to draw letters or shapes in the sky. i filmed it doing this for about 20-30 minutes. there were two other witnesses that saw it move around on my screen in this fashion. i am running short on time so this is all i can submit for now. i will be glad to provide you with the video footage later.
content.summary: I saw a bright star-like object in the sky while looking west. while the object looks like a star it appears too bright to be one.

content.detailedDescription:
Object in sight since last friday - white disk or sphere directly over sioux city iowa. - visible during daylight hours - near directly over head -slightly to the west a few degrees.  object appears as bright star in day time- object visible as of current time 4:00 p.M. sept 25, 2013. i have watched it for one hour. it has not moved.  viewed with binoculars - appears round with small dark spot near center.

first noticed object while watching for aircraft taking off or landing at sioux city airport
content.summary: White disk or sphere shaped object - nearly overhead slightly to the west - high above passing clouds

content.detailedDescription: I filmed this on 9-25-2013 at 4:19 am i had seen another ufo earlier in the night around 8-9 pm that one blinked in and out of view and moved very quickly to diffrent spots before rapidly moving out of sight  and then i  starting seeing this one around 3:20 am and was able to find my camera and film it moved around but stayed around the same area my sister also was able to view it from her apartment in groves tx believe me or not your choice but i know what i seen and this was no plane or star and it was a clear night no clouds at one point during me watching the ufo before i began to film a plane went by it it followed it a ways to the southeast and then came back to where it was before  thats when i noticed there was more than one the other one was to the southeast and harder to see and was not able to film they both left at the same time and went to the southeast direction the one i seen earlier that night did not look the same and moved to the west blinking in and out and then moved southwest before i lost sight within a few seconds not a plane i know what they look like this was diffrent
content.summary: Its was round ball shaped at first sight thought it was a weired bright star till it began to move it pulsated red blue greenish and white lights st one point a plane passed by it and it followed it a ways then came back and hovered around moving slightly

content.detailedDescription: I was setting in my suv i saw a brown thick cloud looking but it was thick an wide but was only like 3 ft tall it flew over the trees in my yard and i noticed the leaves moving on the trees but it wasn't windy out as i couldn't see it any more but i could hear the neighbors dog barking tjen more an more dogs it sounded like the dogs were barking from a straight line path an i assume it was because of the ufo
content.summary: i was setting in my suv saw a brown looking flat but wide looking cloud sortu but thick it flew over the tree tops

content.detailedDescription: I was in my suv at night looking out window that was down i saw a very large ufo ligjt ip light green all the way down all over on the side i could see of it. it was solid looking an was like a straigjt line buy wife then it turned off its lights it was moving when it turned on irs lights. i've seen a lot of ufos and i'm scared.
content.summary: I was setting in my suv with window rolled down saw ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at night on porch watching clouds took picture of two ufos one had gteen lights other had red lights there is no other visible objects that could make it false ni don't live near a airport so its not towers it was ufos.
content.summary: Storm was coming in took picture of two ufos
